name: sap.watt.common.service.ui.WizardStep
description: The wizard step interface. Any wizard step is a UI Wizard Part which its getContent method initiates the step UI (extending sap.watt.uitools.plugin.template.ui.wizard.WizardStepContent) with this.context, and returns the result of getWizardStep method of the wizard service with the step content object, the step title and description
